block.p: BASEBALL National League PHILDAELPHIA PHILLIES - Signed SS carlos Rossario Rodriguez. SAN DIEGO PADRES - Declined to exercise their option on OF Tony Gwynn.
BASEBALL National League PHILDAELPHIA PHILLIES - Signed SS carlos Rossario Rodriguez. SAN DIEGO PADRES - Declined to exercise their option on OF Tony Gwynn.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association NEW JERSEY NETS - Named Aaron Harris assistant director of public relations. LOS ANGELES LAKERS -Signed G Shawn Respert. MINNESOTA TIMBERWOLVES -Signed F LaPhonso Ellis.

FOOTBALL National Football League INDIANAPOLIS COLTS - Signed RB Paul Shields. Waived WR Joey Kent. Signed OL Tim Ridder to the practice squad. TENNESSEE TITANS - Signed WR Chris Jackson and WR Andy McCullough.

HOCKEY National Hockey League NHL - Suspended Anaheim Mighty Ducks F Paul Kariya for one game for a slash on Minnesota Wild F Aaron Gavey in a preseason game on Sept. 29; and Edmonton Oilers D Brad Norton for three games for putting his hands on an official in a preseason game against the Calgary Flames on Sept. 30. LOS ANGELES KINGS - Assigned D Phillippe Boucher to Manitoba of the IHL. PHOENIX COYOTES - Signed LW Brad Ralph to a three-year contract. Assigned F Ramzi Abid and F Ryan Lauzon to Springfield of the AHL. SAN JOSE SHARKS 0 Released C Ron Sutter and D Rudy Poeschek. Assigned LW Doug Friendman to Worcester of the AHL and G Johan Hedberg to Manitoba of the IHL.

COLLEGE ATLANTIC 10 CONFERENCE - Signed Linda Bruno, commissioner, to a multiyear contract. NORTH CAROLINA STATE - Signed Herb Sendek, men's basketball coach, to a two-year contract extension, through the 2004-05 season. WISCONSIN - Suspended men's junior basketball F Maurice Linton, sophomore G Travon Davis and women's senior basketball C Krista Bird for for eight games for receiving unadvertised discounts at a shoe store.
